List.description:
List represents a list of items.

Unordered lists must have its `style` field set to `bulleted`.
Ordered lists, instead, have its `style` field set to `numbered`.

ListItem.description: ListItem represents an item in a List

anyOf.description: Paragraph represents a unit of textual content
Span represents a text node. It might optionally contain formatting styles called marks

marks.description: optional, array of styles for the current chunk of text

anyOf.description: Link represents a hyperlink

items.description: Span represents a text node. It might optionally contain formatting styles called marks

marks.description: optional, array of styles for the current chunk of text

anyOf.description: ItemLink is similar to a Link node, but instead of linking a portion of text to a URL, it links the document to another record present in the DatoCMS project

items.description: Span represents a text node. It might optionally contain formatting styles called marks

marks.description: optional, array of styles for the current chunk of text

anyOf.description: InlineItem, similarly to ItemLink, links the document to another record but does not specify any inner content (children)
